name: Health Potion
description:
A 15-minute single-player card game about buying equipment, casting spells, puzzling your way around mechanically varied monsters, and trying to earn an honest buck.

Featuring:

  • Over 25 unique enemies
  • 40+ weapons, items and spells
  • Small numbers
  • Narrow victories
  • Broken combos
  • Careful turn planning
  • Short play sessions
  • 2 bosses (and 1 super secret final boss)
  • Gaming's most incompetent wizards
  • Fightable Custard
